## ModVisualization interface

All types of content in the mod that can be read and/or modified by the mod API. Observables can be used as parameters to the `mod.reader` method in order to read the content. TODO: Write/review documentation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ModVisualization 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [axis(name)](./spotfire-api.modvisualization.axis.md) | A mod axis. |
|  [data()](./spotfire-api.modvisualization.data.md) | A read only representation of the Data view. |
|  [mainTable()](./spotfire-api.modvisualization.maintable.md) | The main table used in the mod visualization. |
|  [property(name)](./spotfire-api.modvisualization.property.md) | Properties can be read and modified to store state in the mod. |
|  [windowSize()](./spotfire-api.modvisualization.windowsize.md) | Read the current mod window size. |
